output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ghg = read_csv("final_GHG_2015-June2022.csv")
ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(1,50))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = Depth_m, color = ch4_umolL))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_y_reverse()+
  facet_wrap(~Site)

ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(1,50),
         Depth_m == 3)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = ch4_umolL, color = as.factor(Site)))+
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("3 m")

ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(1,50),
         Depth_m == 0.1)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = ch4_umolL, color = as.factor(Site)))+
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("0.1 m")

ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(1),
         Depth_m %in% c(4,3,0.1))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = ch4_umolL, color = as.factor(Depth_m)))+
  scale_color_discrete(name = "Depth (m)")+
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("Site 01")

ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(1,50),
         Depth_m == 0.1)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = co2_umolL, color = as.factor(Site)))+
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("0.1 m")

ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(1),
         Depth_m %in% c(4,3,0.1))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = co2_umolL, color = as.factor(Depth_m)))+
  scale_color_discrete(name = "Depth (m)")+
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("Site 01")


ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(50),
         Depth_m%in%c(0.1,3,6))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = ch4_umolL, color = as.factor(Depth_m)))+
  scale_color_discrete(name = "Depth (m)")+
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("Site 50")

ghg%>%
  filter(year(DateTime)==2022,
         Reservoir == "BVR",
         Site %in% c(50),
         Depth_m%in%c(0.1,3,6))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = DateTime, y = co2_umolL, color = as.factor(Depth_m)))+
  scale_color_discrete(name = "Depth (m)")+
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("Site 50")
```
